title: The Collected Courtney Crumrin (Oni|2002-2013|Digital) Â®0.9
description:
" Courtney promised to let the captive goblin go if he cooperated. I'm afraid she 
   didn't keep her word. Night Things, after all, aren't capable of actually lying, 
   so it sometimes catches them off guard. " 

---

Contains (see <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Courtney_Crumrin" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Courtney_Crumrin</a>  for overview):

THE NIGHT THINGS 00-04 - The colored 2012 version of the original 4-issue miniseries from 2002, plus TPB extras. Individual Digital Lo-Res Minutemen re-releases.

THE COVEN OF MYSTICS - Colored version of the second 4-issue miniseries from 2002/3, compiled into a single volume from the Digital Hi-Res Empire re-releases.

THE TWILIGHT KINGDOM - Colored version of the third 4-issue 2003/4 miniseries, ditto.

GRAPHIC NOVELS - Three 60-page OGNs published from 2005 thru 2011 in black-and-white.

COURTNEY CRUMRIN - Original colored 10-issue series from 2012-2013; compiled into 4 pseudo-TPBs per narrative continuity from the Digital 0-Day releases by Nahga-Empire.

   (Note: Unusual resolutions abound, perhaps due to in turn unusual aspect ratios.)

Misses: For the fourth GN, "The Fire Thief's Tale", published 2007, I was only able to locate an indie scan whose quality was simply not up to par; thus the "0.9" label.
